title: SAG Awards 2022: Lady Gaga's 'House of Gucci,' Will Smith's 'King Richard' vie for best cast
description: The 28th Screen Actors Guild Awards is the first major show of 2022 on the way to the Academy Awards next month. Here are the winners and highlights.
content:
USA TODAY Film Critic Brian Truitt breaks down his snubs and surprises from the 2022 SAG Awards nominations, headlined by Kristen Stewart.
USA TODAY
